package_info.name: Starter Package
package_info.tagline: Perfect for small businesses getting started with AI automation

competitive_pricing.vs_competitors: 93% below competitors' PPC-only packages ($1,450) while including Voice AI they don't offer
competitive_pricing.value_statement: Get AI voice agents 24/7 for less than hiring a part-time receptionist
competitive_pricing.roi_example: Capture just 5 extra leads/month at $200 avg value = $1,000 ROI (10x return)
competitive_pricing.market_position: Best value in market - includes AI technology NO competitor offers

seo.title: Starter Package - $97/mo | AI Voice Agent for Small Business | Capture Client
seo.meta_description: Get started with AI automation for just $97/month. Includes AI Voice Agent setup, 50 calls/month, lead qualification, and CRM integration. Perfect for small businesses.

hero.headline: Start Capturing More Leads with AI
hero.subheadline: AI Voice Agent + Lead Qualification for just $97/month

ideal_for.headline: Perfect For:
audience: Businesses missing calls during busy hours
Companies wanting to test AI before scaling
Businesses handling 50-100 inbound calls per month

features_included.name: 1 Custom AI Voice Agent
features_included.description: Fully trained AI agent that sounds natural and represents your brand. Handles inbound calls 24/7 with custom greetings and responses.

features_included.name: 50 AI Phone Calls Per Month
features_included.description: Up to 50 calls handled by your AI agent each month. Perfect for small businesses just getting started.

features_included.name: Basic Lead Qualification
features_included.description: AI asks qualifying questions to separate serious prospects from tire kickers. Collects name, phone, email, and service interest.

features_included.name: Email Notifications
features_included.description: Instant email alerts when your AI captures a qualified lead. Get transcripts of every conversation.

features_included.name: 1 CRM Integration
features_included.description: Connect to one CRM system (GoHighLevel, HubSpot, Salesforce, etc). Leads auto-sync in real-time.

features_included.name: Monthly Reports
features_included.description: Detailed monthly performance reports showing calls answered, leads captured, and conversion rates.

features_included.name: Email Support
features_included.description: Email support during business hours with response within 24 hours.

upgrade_prompt.headline: Need More Calls or Features?
upgrade_prompt.description: Upgrade to Growth Package for unlimited calls, 2 AI agents, and Facebook Ads management.

value_proposition.headline: What Makes This Package Perfect for Starting Out

benefits.title: Never Miss a Call Again
benefits.description: Your AI answers every call instantly, even when you're with another customer. No more lost leads.

benefits.title: Qualify Leads Automatically
benefits.description: AI asks the right questions to determine if callers are serious buyers. Only qualified leads reach your inbox.

benefits.title: Save 10+ Hours Per Week
benefits.description: Stop answering repetitive questions. Let AI handle initial inquiries while you focus on closing deals.

benefits.title: Test Before You Scale
benefits.description: Start small with 50 calls/month. Once you see results, upgrade to Growth or Enterprise packages.

testimonials.quote: Within the first week, the AI answered 23 calls that came in after hours. We closed 4 of those leads. Already paid for itself!
testimonials.author: Mike Henderson

testimonials.quote: I was skeptical about AI, but the Starter Package let me test it without a huge commitment. Now we're capturing leads we used to miss. Upgrading to Growth next month.
testimonials.author: Sarah Martinez

faq.question: What happens if I go over 50 calls in a month?
faq.answer: No problem! We'll notify you when you're approaching your limit. You can either upgrade to the Growth Package or purchase additional call bundles at $2 per call.

faq.question: How long does setup take?
faq.answer: Most customers are live within 3-5 business days. We'll train your AI agent on your business, test it thoroughly, and get your approval before going live.

faq.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade later?
faq.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade to Growth or Enterprise anytime. Upgrades take effect immediately. Downgrades take effect at your next billing cycle.

faq.question: What if the AI doesn't understand a caller?
faq.answer: Our AI handles 95%+ of calls successfully. For complex questions, it collects contact info and schedules a callback with you.

faq.question: Do I need any special phone equipment?
faq.answer: Nope! We integrate with your existing phone system. Works with landlines, VoIP, cell phones - whatever you're using now.

trust_signals.title: No Long-Term Contract
trust_signals.description: Month-to-month billing. Cancel anytime with 30 days notice.

trust_signals.title: Setup Included
trust_signals.description: No setup fees. We handle everything to get you live.

trust_signals.title: Free Training
trust_signals.description: We train your AI on your business - no extra charge.
